overview: Elder Holland has been able to get away with a lot. With his blond hair, toned body, and charming smile, it's no surprise that he's become quite popular. He's only been on his mission a short while, but he's already earned a reputation for being a bit of a mischief-maker. He's gotten into trouble for pantsing the other boys, short-sheeting beds, and turning off alarm clocks so the other missionaries through their wake-up times. Needless to say, the higher priesthood is keeping an eye on him. The men of the Order love a rebel. There's no greater joy than seeing a willful young man brought to his knees, ready and eager to serve. Elder Holland thinks he's a big man, but he'll soon discover that he'll do anything to hear the words "good boy."
title: Elder Holland: Chapters 1-6
